A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Liked this one even more than a force awakens. I think it's a great continuation in this trilogy set. I definitely was let down on some aspects of the story (spoiler: the fact that they let me down on Rey's parents and Snoke's backstory\, kinda made me sad). But still\, I see Rian's vision and I am good with it. Overall a great main story line. Liked it enough that I will see it once more in the theater and will pre order the blu-ray.
